author: Jean P. May, Jr.
releaseNotes:
v2.0.10 add delayed update option
2.0.9 - allow the use a list of hubs instead of Hub Mesh
2.0.8 - add switch capability to make HomeKit work
2.0.7 - add initialize capability to load current hub version into msg attribute
2.0.6 - push request even if publisher current, notesUrl fix
2.0.5 - fix code reversion issue
